# NSScroller.Style.overlay

**Case**

Specifies overlay-style scrollers in macOS 10.7 and later.

## Declaration

```swift
case overlay
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Style.legacy**: Specifies legacy-style scrollers as prior to macOS 10.7.

items.description: Specifies legacy-style scrollers as prior to macOS 10.7.
